messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Glory to the USSRS, sec is now the gulag, capitalism is banned. enjoy your pay raises, since now everything is free

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Armory.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Can we get an engineer to fix botany

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Well i got my revenge on the suckers who tried to kill me should i call shuttle y/n

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Quartermaster's Office.
